name: webhooker
description: HTTP webhook server that runs scripts by config
author: ifgeny87

scripts.dev: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug WEBHOOKER_CONFIG=env/dev/config.simple.json npx tsx watch src/main.ts
scripts.build: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build', {recursive: true, force: true})" && tsc && node scripts/fix-esm-imports.cjs
scripts.test: c8 --reporter=text --include build/src --exclude build/src/main.js node --loader ts-node/esm node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha.js --extensions ts tests/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage: c8 --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --lines 95 --functions 95 --branches 95 --include build/src --exclude build/src/main.js node --loader ts-node/esm node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha.js --extensions ts tests/**/*.test.ts
